original_title: Breakfast Ritual: Art Must Be Artificial
overview: Breakfast Ritual presents a speculative glimpse into a post-Anthropocene future in which human civilization as we know it no longer exists. Over breakfast, an AI in the form of a young girl performs a ritual in semblance of Marina Abramović’s seminal work Art Must Be Beautiful, Artist Must Be Beautiful (1975).
title: Breakfast Ritual: Art Must Be Artificial
